original_title: Sex Academy Erotic Massage for Couples
overview: Sexpert of the year Dr. Ava Cadell & sex therapist Dr. Hernando Chaves guide you through live demonstrations of real couples experiencing body-melting orgasmic erotic massage.  Learn step-by-step how to create a sensual atmosphere and incorporate props and sex toys to increase erotic sensations. Use verbal and body language to communicate your wants, needs and erotic massage desires. Experiment with lubes and massage oils while caressing your lover with a variety of types of touch, then discover how to give your lover a hands free massage by using every part of your body.
tagline: Give Your Lover An Erotic Massage With A Happy Ending!
title: Sex Academy Erotic Massage for Couples
